text: Rupa is a small town in the West Kameng district in the Indian state of Arunachal Pradesh.According to Census 2011 information the location code or village code of Rupa village is 261802. Rupa village is located in Rupa Tehsil of West Kameng district in Arunachal Pradesh, India. Rupa is nearest town to Rupa village. Category:West Kameng district
title: Rupa, Arunachal Pradesh
